scripts.start: bun run setup && bun run orquestrate:prod
scripts.dev: bun run setup && bun run orquestrate:dev
scripts.orquestrate:prod: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,BANNER" -c "blue,green,yellow" "bun run start:backend" "bun run dev:frontend" "sleep 2 && bun run scripts/banner.ts"
scripts.orquestrate:dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,BANNER" -c "blue,green,yellow" "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend" "sleep 2 && bun run scripts/banner.ts"
scripts.setup: bun run setup:env && bun run validate-ports && bun run validate-auth && bun run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd apps/backend && bunx prisma generate && bunx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.check: bun run check:shared && bun run check:backend && bun run check:frontend
scripts.validate: bun run build:frontend && bun run test:full
scripts.test:full: bun run test:validate && bun run test:prepare && bun run test:setup && bun test && bun run test:cleanup
scripts.test:cli: cd apps/cli && bun run src/interfaces/cli/index.ts run $@
